content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: smithing_table
inventory=[{"type": "pink_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 22, "index": 25}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 22, "index": 35}, {"type": "lily_of_the_valley", "quantity": 35, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_diorite_slab", "quantity": 32, "index": 40}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft an item of type smithing_table, I need to craft an item of type acacia_planks. To do this, I need to place an item of type jungle_log on the crafting table. Therefore, I will move the item at slot 31 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smithing_table
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "pink_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 22, "index": 25}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 22, "index": 35}, {"type": "lily_of_the_valley", "quantity": 35, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_diorite_slab", "quantity": 32, "index": 40}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the jungle_planks, I need to move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

thought: To craft a smithing_table, I need to place an iron_ingot in the middle of the crafting table and wood planks on either side. I have two iron ingots in slot 32, so I will move one of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1
